markets.question: Will Google publicly launch a ChatGPT competitor by March 31?
markets.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Google publicly launches an LLM-based chatbot (including any beta or test versions) by March 31, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Alphabet or Google, including accessing the actual chatbot service, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
